product_info.title: Premium Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil from Ancient Hebron Trees
product_info.short_description: Cold-pressed, organic extra virgin olive oil harvested from ancient trees in the hills of Hebron.
product_info.long_description: Experience the liquid gold of Palestine. Our Extra Virgin Olive Oil is cold-pressed from olives hand-picked from ancient trees in the fertile hills of Hebron. Rich in antioxidants and healthy fats, this oil boasts a robust, peppery flavor profile with notes of green almond and fresh herbs. Perfect for dipping, drizzling over salads, or finishing warm dishes. By purchasing this oil, you directly support Palestinian farmers maintaining their ancestral lands.

lifestyle_images: Oil being poured into a ceramic bowl
Bottle next to fresh bread and olives

marketplace_strategy.target_audience: Gourmet cooks, health-conscious consumers, supporters of fair trade

product_info.title: Grade A Palestinian Medjoul Dates - Jericho Harvest
product_info.short_description: Succulent, caramel-like Medjoul dates grown in the historic city of Jericho.
product_info.long_description: Known as the 'King of Dates', these Palestinian Medjoul dates are grown in the rich soil of Jericho, the lowest city on earth. Naturally sweet with a soft, chewy texture and notes of caramel and honey. These dates are a powerhouse of energy, fiber, and essential minerals. Sourced directly from family-owned farms committed to sustainable agriculture.

media_requirements.main_image: Close up of dates in a wooden box
lifestyle_images: Dates arranged on a platter with nuts and tea

marketplace_strategy.target_audience: Health enthusiasts, fasting communities (Ramadan), gourmet snackers

product_info.title: Hand-Embroidered Bethlehem Tatreez Thobe (Dress)
product_info.short_description: Authentic, handcrafted Thobe featuring traditional Bethlehem cross-stitch patterns.
product_info.long_description: A masterpiece of Palestinian heritage. This traditional Thobe is hand-embroidered by women artisans in Bethlehem, featuring the iconic 'coucing' stitch unique to the region. Made from high-quality fabric, the vibrant red geometric patterns tell stories of the land and its history. Each dress takes weeks to complete, making it a unique wearable work of art. Supports women's economic empowerment.

media_requirements.main_image: Full length front view on mannequin or model
lifestyle_images: Close up of chest embroidery details

marketplace_strategy.target_audience: Cultural enthusiasts, fashion collectors, diaspora community

product_info.title: Traditional Nablus Olive Oil Soap (Al-Jamal)
product_info.short_description: Pure, unscented olive oil soap made using the 10th-century Nabulsi tradition.
product_info.long_description: Discover the purity of Nabulsi soap. Handcrafted in Nablus using virgin olive oil, water, and alkaline sodium compound, this soap follows a recipe unchanged for over 1,000 years. Free from synthetic fragrances, dyes, and preservatives. Gentle enough for babies and those with sensitive skin (eczema, psoriasis). It cleanses without stripping natural oils, leaving skin soft and moisturized.

media_requirements.main_image: Stack of soap cubes showing brand stamp
lifestyle_images: Soap next to olive branch and water bowl

product_info.title: Hand-Blown Hebron Glass Swirl Lamp
product_info.short_description: Exquisite hand-blown glass lamp featuring the signature Hebron swirl pattern.
product_info.long_description: Illuminate your space with the colors of Hebron. This unique table lamp is hand-blown by master glassblowers using recycled glass, a tradition dating back to the Roman period. The signature 'Phoenician' swirl pattern blends vibrant blues, turquoises, and ambers. Each piece is unique. Durable, eco-friendly, and a stunning conversation starter.

media_requirements.main_image: Lamp lit up in a dim room
lifestyle_images: Lamp unlit on a wooden side table
Close up of the glass swirls

product_info.title: Classic Palestinian Za'atar Blend
product_info.short_description: Aromatic blend of wild thyme, roasted sesame seeds, and sumac.
product_info.long_description: The taste of a Palestinian breakfast. Our Za'atar is a proprietary blend of wild thyme (hyssop) gathered from the hills, mixed with roasted sesame seeds, tart sumac, and a pinch of salt. Fragrant and savory. Traditionally eaten with olive oil and bread, but excellent as a seasoning for roasted chicken, vegetables, or yogurt. High in antioxidants.

media_requirements.main_image: Bowl of Za'atar next to a bowl of olive oil

marketplace_strategy.target_audience: Foodies, chefs, Middle Eastern cuisine lovers

product_info.title: Olive Wood Hand-Carved Nativity Set
product_info.short_description: Minimalist nativity scene hand-carved from Holy Land olive wood trimmings.
product_info.long_description: A piece of the Holy Land for your home. This Nativity set is hand-carved by Christian families in Bethlehem and Jerusalem uses sustainable trimmings from ancient olive trees. The wood grain is rich and swirling, making every figure unique. The smooth, faceless design offers a modern, timeless aesthetic. Perfect for Christmas or as a year-round symbol of peace.

media_requirements.main_image: Full set arranged on a mantelpiece
lifestyle_images: Close up of wood grain on Joseph figure

marketplace_strategy.target_audience: Christian community, gift shoppers, wood art collectors

product_info.title: Ceramic Hand-Painted Serving Bowl - Floral
product_info.short_description: Vibrant, food-safe serving bowl hand-painted with traditional Palestinian floral motifs.
product_info.long_description: Bring joy to your table. This large serving bowl is crafted in Hebron, famous for its ceramics. Hand-painted with intricate floral arabesques in cobalt blues, greens, and reds. Glazed and fired for durability. Food safe, microwave safe. Ideal for serving salads, pasta, or as a fruit bowl center piece.

media_requirements.main_image: Top-down view of empty bowl to show pattern
